sentence1: If students do not know what the process of condensation is, you can tell them it is the opposite of evaporation. In evaporation, a liquid (like water) changes state to become a gas (water vapor). In condensation, a gas (like water vapor) changes state to become a liquid (water).
sentence2: Evaporation is responsible for changing liquid water into water vapor.
label: entails
